moves.1. c4 e5 2. Nc3 Nf6: Starts out with the english opening.
moves.5. g3 d6: Bringing out pawns so bishops can be developed.
moves.8. Bg5 Qe7: More developing. The knight is pinned!
moves.9. Nd5 Qe6: This was a mistake for black.
moves.10. Nxc7 Qd7 11. Nxa8: The knight comes in with Nxc7 and takes a rook. ROOOOOOOK!!!!!
moves.11... Rxa8 12. Bxf6 gxf6: More blundering for black. This isn't the best.
moves.13. a3 Bh3 14. b4: Black's up to something! He wants to end the game fast. Meanwhile, White attacks the bishop.
moves.15... Bd4 16. Rb1 Rd8: Blacks bishop has moved, and is making a battery, but it is blocked.
moves.18... Nf5 19. Nxd4 exd4: A trade happens. A knight is taken!!!!!!
moves.23... Ne3+: The night forks the king, rook and queen, and the queen is hopelessly lost. White resigns. He probably shouldn't have resigned though, because he still would have a chance. This concludes the game that forked!
